  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      The initialize function for the controller of the appointments.fxml. Contains the tableview that displays appointment information.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - the url
      resourceBundle - the resourceBundle to be used

    • onAddAppointmentClick

      public void onAddAppointmentClick() throws IOException
      Handles the click event for the add button. Loads the addAppointment.fxml when clicked.
      Throws:
      IOException - load() throws IOException

    • onUpdateAppointmentClick

      public void onUpdateAppointmentClick() throws IOException
      Handles the click event for the update button. Loads the updateAppointment.fxml when clicked.
      Throws:
      IOException - load() throws IOException

    • onDeleteAppointmentClick

      public void onDeleteAppointmentClick() throws SQLException
      Handles the click event for the delete button. When successful it deletes an appointment from the MySQL database.
      Throws:
      SQLException - deleteAppointment() throws SQLException

    • onAllFilterRadioClick

      public void onAllFilterRadioClick()
      Handles the click event for the all radio button. Filters appointments in order by appointment id.

    • onWeeklyFilterRadioClick

      public void onWeeklyFilterRadioClick()
      Handles the click event for the weekly radio button. Filters appointments in order by week number out of the year.

    • onMonthlyFilterRadioClick

      public void onMonthlyFilterRadioClick()
      Handles the click event for the monthly radio button. Filters appointments in order by month number out of the year.

    • refreshAppointmentTable

      private void refreshAppointmentTable()
      Refreshes the tableview.
